error.message: Class Drupal\allowed_formats\Tests\AllowedFormatsTest extends deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Tests\taxonomy\Functional\TaxonomyTestTrait in class Drupal\allowed_formats\Tests\AllowedFormatsTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\taxonomy\Traits\TaxonomyTestTrait instead.

Call to method setUp() of deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.
Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.
Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to allowed_formats.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
